Methods¶

pyet currently contains eighteen different potential evaporation methods.

  • Temperature
    • Blaney-Criddle (1950)
    • Hamon (1961)
    • Romanenko (1961)
    • Linacre (1977)
  • Radiation
    • Turc (1961)
    • Jensen and Haise (2005)
    • McGuinness and Bordne (1972)
    • Hargreaves (Hargreaves and Samani, 1982; 1985)
    • Doorenbos–Pruitt (FAO-24) (Jensen et al., 1990)
    • Abtew (1996)
    • Makkink (1957)
    • Oudin (1961)
  • Combination
    • Penman (1948)
    • FAO-56 Penman-Monteith (Allen, 1998)
    • Penman-Monteith (Monteith, 1965)
    • Kimberly-Penman (Wright, 1982)
    • Priestley and Taylor (1972)
    • Thom and Oliver (1977)
  • Units
